post.body: ok maybe zebras r not tht sissy after all. Jst don't start drawing pink unicorn :p
congrats! dah jadik hass-beng orang.. hehe
oit bro hehe selamat hari tua. Dang ur 30! Don't break ur neck yet hehe
I wanna go to d office but the boss said NO, not until 2nd Jan 09. Weird or lucky me?
Black carrera s is definitely nicer than d silver one. but aston martin v8 is still the most macho of all..cant wait for test drive tmrw!!!
Some dude at hartamas came up to me and say :" hey Ir**n! You still dj-ing?" Thought that 'u looked like Ir**n' thingy stopped long time ago
At Jake's for a birthday dinner. RIBSSS and OYSTERS and more RIBBSS!! Wohooo!!!
Bored.Waiting for 830 tonite, maybe some steaks and oysters at Jakes's will make my day hehe.
Dang the car's power steering failed. Using my strength to steer..Argghhh!!!!
Cute tiny baby.. At Tmn TAR visiting cousin's first child.
Late for a baby shower thingy n me wifey still not awake. Hmmm..
